objects.description:
Twidere is an open source Android Twitter client. 

Features:

* Dark/Light theme, with theme color support
* Media preview
* Built in image viewer (with animated gif support) and map viewer
* All tabs are customizable
* Direct messages with conversation style
* Very powerful filters (mute unwanted tweets)
* Drafts feature
* Extension support like Twicca, but more friendly to users and developers
* t.co link auto expanding
* Multiple account support
* Basic features supported for StatusNet/Fanfou
* Custom OAuth consumer key/secret
* Direct login with user name and password (Don't worry! It's TOTALLY safe!)
* Custom API Proxy (jtapi recommended, gtap and twip o mode works)
* GZip compressing for API requests
* TCP DNS query and custom host mapping to fight against censorship
* Many many many other configurations to fit your habit
* Free, open source, NO ads, forever!

Note: I'm just the maintainer of the package for the Sailfish Store (authorized by the dev himself). For feedback, you'd better use the Twidere issue tracker at https://github.com/TwidereProject/Twidere-Android/issues 
You can donate to the dev using https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=mariotaku.lee%40gmail%2ecom&item_name=Donate%20to%20Twidere
objects.summary: Twidere is an open source Android Twitter client.
objects.title: Twidere

objects.description:
IBAN Checker is a native SailfishOS app for a formal check of IBANs (International Bank Account Number). You can either fill in a complete IBAN (copy & paste) or create it step-by-step by selecting country, checksum and bank account number. If the checksum is not filled in (or is set to either '00' or 'xx') it is calculated. Please NOTE, that the IBAN check is only done by checking the number against the given checksum using the algorithm described in ISO 13616-1:2007. The actual validity can only be checked by banks and finance institutes.

The app is GPLv3 licensed and written in QML and C++.
objects.summary: SailfishOS app for a formal check of IBANs (International Bank Account Number)
objects.title: IBAN Checker

objects.description:
Put your *.gbc roms to "/home/nemo/Documents/jboycolor_roms". The folder will be also created on first launch.

objects.description:
HERE WeGo is a free app that makes city navigation effortless. With detailed routes, turn-by-turn guidance and information about every way of getting around, itâs the only app you need to get through the city.
 
MORE OPTIONS MEAN LESS HASSLE.
Take your car, ride your bike or hop on public transport to get to your destination. If youâre in a hurry, call a taxi or check nearby car clubs. HERE WeGo has recommendations for all the ways you can get around, so you can compare and pick the best one for you.
 
SMARTER PLANNING BEFORE YOU GO.
HERE WeGo tells you everything about your route before you go. You can see the cost for public transport tickets and taxi fares, the traffic delay on any drive â even how flat or hilly your bike ride will be.
 
BETTER GUIDANCE ALONG THE WAY.
On the move, HERE WeGo gets you to your destination with ease. Turn-by-turn voice guidance for drivers keeps you stress-free behind the wheel. If youâre walking or taking public transport, youâll know every step and every transfer just when you need it.
 
EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KEEP MOVING.
HERE WeGo means youâll have alternatives when delays are slowing others down. Live traffic and public transport information keeps you in the know, so you have the flexibility to stay on the go no matter what happens. You can even choose to download maps, so HERE WeGo keeps working if youâre in an area with no signal. 

HERE WeGo offers transport information in 1300 cities around the world including: New York City / NYC, San Francisco / SF, London, Berlin, Munich, Paris, Barcelona, Madrid, Rome, Milan, Vancouver, Toronto, Sydney, Melbourne and many more. Get to where you need to go via subway / metro / underground, bus, bike, train, tram, or ferry. 

INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE
HERE WeGo has offline maps of the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Canada, Australia and more than 100 other countries around the world. Download the map you want and youâre set!

INTEGRATION & PARTNERSHIPS
HERE has partnered with other great companies to give you the best location experience and information to help you get around the city, no matter where are you. Some of our partners include:
- GetYourGuide
- Trip Advisor
- BlaBlaCar
- Expedia
- Car2Go
- Wikipedia
- Hotels Combined

With the help of our partners, you can find the closest points-of-interests (POI) nearby such as ATM machines, restaurants, bars, car parks, gas stations, car clubs, taxi stands, pharmacies, car rentals and local tours.

So where will you go? It's all up to you. Because wherever your destination is, and however you're travelling, HERE is how you get there.
objects.summary: HERE WeGo: Effortless city navigation
objects.title: HERE WeGo

objects.description:
Hardware and software information utility for Android based devices. Based on the extensive hardware knowledge of the AIDA64 for Windows application, AIDA64 for Android is capable of showing various diagnostic information for phones, tablets, smartwatches and TVs, including:

- CPU detection, real-time core clock measurement
- Screen dimensions, pixel density and camera information
- Battery level and temperature monitoring
- WiFi and cellular network information
- Android OS and Dalvik properties
- SoC and device model identification
- Memory and storage utilization
- OpenGL ES GPU details, real-time GPU clock measurement
- Vulkan, OpenCL, CUDA, PCI, USB device listing
- Sensor polling
- Listing of installed apps, codecs and system directories
- Android Wear module: native app for watches

System requirements:
- Android 2.1 or later

Required permissions:
- ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
- ACCESS_WIFI_STATE -- also known as Wi-Fi connection information. AIDA64 requires this permission to show WiFi network information like signal strength and SSID.
- INTERNET
- CAMERA. AIDA64 requires this permission to show camera information like picture resolution. AIDA64 does not take any photos or videos.
objects.summary: Hardware and software information utility for Android devices
objects.title: AIDA64 for Android

- Battery level and temperature monitoring

- Sailfish OS and Android properties

- Memory and storage utilization
- OpenGL ES GPU details, real-time GPU clock measurement
- PCI and USB device listing

objects.summary: Hardware and software information utility for Sailfish OS devices
objects.title: AIDA64

objects.description:
The shopping list that works to the natural process of shopping.

The first page of the app shows the shopping list of items to shop. 

The items are added in Search page, just type to search field, and matches remembered by the application are showed. Tap on a match to select, or if there's no match for the typed item name, it will be added as new.

The items are edited before insertion to the list, to match the current need. Item details from last use of the named item are prefilled, if available - for new items you fill what you want - a name without further details  is acceptable as well.

Each item consists of togglable ON/OFF button, item name, quantity and unit. Each item has also a context menu to hide, flag, edit, quick add, quick decrease and delete the item.

The items viewed can be filtered to a certain shop, any shop, or just view items that have no specific supply.

The application works on the phone's local memory, which makes it access quality independent. In many indoor sites like shops, internet access quality drops.

The app neither will tell about your shopping habits to supermarket chains, advertisers or friends.
objects.summary: Ostos is a shopping list application, that makes creation and use of grocery shopping list fluent . The items can be marked up quickly, list can be viewed per shop, and it has a clever way of working.
objects.title: Ostos

objects.description: SailBabel is an offline dictionary for Sailfish OS. Note that this program does not include translations or wordlists. Just copy your own set of translations to a text file in the sub-folder Dictionaries within the Documents directory. This file is expected to contain two tab-separated columns each containing a word or phrase in one language and its translation into another language, respectively. Dictionary text files may be downloaded from e.g. http://www1.dict.cc/translation_file_request.php?l=e Depending on the dictionary's size SailBabel may require a large amount of memory. Close other apps before starting SailBabel if there is insufficient memory.
objects.summary: SailBabel is an offline dictionary for Sailfish OS.
objects.title: SailBabel

objects.description: Welcome to Geometris. A game that will make you vibrate. Action packed, manage your ship to go ending with geometris of each level. objects.description:
A task for this app is to find a text inside files stored locally on a device and present the results in a possibly useful form.
The program always opens searched files as read only, so there is no danger to destroy any data.
Features:
* Search results are divided between dynamically expanded sections indicating different file types.
* Currently  supported file types: text, html, SQLite db.
* Special section for results found in Notes app database.
* Found text is presented in a detailed view with a context. Select and copy presented result is possible.
* User has additional possibility to launch an application to which the found database belongs.
* Found html files can be viewed inside SearchNemo or in external browser.
* For opening files externally an xdg-open program is used.
* Starting search directory can be setup or given as a command line parameter
* on/off option to use symbolic links as a search path

The source code is based on excellent File Browser (https://github.com/karip/harbour-file-browser) from which I took the search function as a starting point for creating SearchNemo. Thus, it has also several features imported from the File Browser and not mentioned here.
objects.summary: A simple text search tool for various local file types.
objects.title: SearchNemo

objects.description:
Stockmarket is a simple application for getting stock quotes & history charts. It has also pre defined stock market indices from different stocks in the world. Follow the stocks you care about most by adding to your portfolio.

- Navigation -
Switch between indicies or pre selected stocks by using pulley menu on the top or bottom. Beside switching to next stock/index, the top pulley menu have following options: âAboutâ, âMy portfolioâ, and âStock market indicesâ. When entering one of the later of those two, the app will automatically select that type, even if immediately returning to Main page. 

On the bottom pulley menu, there is the option to go back in history and see old close values presented on a chart. The user have option to get a period of 1 week, 1 month, 3 months or 1 year.  

- My Portfolio -
Stock elements are showed with name and symbol. The first time the application is used there should be eight well known companies available on the portfolio. 
 Adding a stock can be done by first go to search menu on the top pulley menu. Type the name of the stock and after the third letter 10 choices should be revealed. Long-press the desired stock and afterward tapping âAdd stockâ. User is taken back to the main portfolio page.

Deleting stock is easy. Just long-press the stock and tap âDelete stockâ.

- Indicies -
Select what indicies that want to be used for retrieving and presenting on Main or Cover page. User shall afterward accept the changes by tapping âAcceptâ. No index is removed, only unselected. 

- Cover -
Cover has almost the same information as Main page, except no history functionality.  To compensate that, currency and change value are showed instead.  

- Issues -
Since Yahoo YQL has requests/hour per IP limitation. The application doesn't update automatically. Therefore user need to update manually. Option can be found on the bottom pulley menu on Main page or middle button on Cover page.

Yahoo sometimes respond with older values in case of several stock/index requests sent in a short notice. Future plans are to change API.

Two of indexes, SSE Composite and NIFTY 50, will not show daily data, but can be used for flashbacks of earlier history. This is Yahoo YQL restrictions, not application lacking functionality.
objects.summary: Stockmarket is a simple application for getting stock quotes & history charts. It has also pre defined stock market indices from different stocks in the world.
objects.title: Stockmarket

objects.description:
This brain teasing game will give you tons of fun with special designed levels.

Like many other versions of the game, the principles of Mayan Secret do not stray too far away from the original game but the layout and way the game is played do.

Mayan Secret has been made successful thanks to a game called Shanghai, requiring players to master the art of concentration and strategic thinking in order to remove all the tiles from the board. The aim of this Mayan Solitair is very similar to other versions of Mahjong Solitaire; if you are unfamiliar with the overall objective then it is very simple to understand: clear the layout of tiles by selecting matching pairs of tiles, resulting in a clear board.

Only two tiles can be removed from the board at a time, these tiles must be identically matching. The next part is what makes the game difficult â tiles can only be removed if they connected by a maximum of three lines. Tiles joined by horizontal and vertical lines but not diagonal and lines may cross over an empty border. Every move can affect a future one so it is important to think ahead when selecting your pairs.

The game is over when tiles are left on the board but further moves are not possible.

Challenge every aspect of your brain to be the first one to clear all thousand levels!
objects.summary: Mayan Secret is a variation of the Mahjong Solitaire with exotic theme.
objects.title: Mayan Secret

objects.changes: Babbage has a degree operator Â° now. It converts an angle given in degree into radians (via multiplying by pi/180). The Â° symbol is not available on all keyboards. Alternatively, the degree operator can be written as deg preceded by a space. Thus, sin(45Â°) is equivalent to sin(45 deg).
objects.description: Babbage is a scientific calculator that evaluates mathematical expressions in standard mathematical notation.  Mathematical operators for addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (*), division (/), exponentiation (^) and factorial (!) are supported.  Expressions may involve various mathematical and statistical functions.  Results may be assigned to variables for later use in further calculations.
objects.summary: Babbage is a scientific calculator and mathematical expressions evaluator for Sailfish OS.
objects.title: Babbage

objects.description:
This app has been designed to help you find Metro routes which can be used to travel from one location to another in Bangalore.

The search provides you with a list of routes which can be used to travel from source to destination stations. You can also display the metro map covering the relevant stations.
The app provides the number of train changes and station stops involved in each route.

objects.description:
This is a little funny app drawing a small little Tux (linux mascott) assistant on the screen which lives on your multitasking (home) view. 

You can drag him around or change the character to one of your liking. 
This is a totally useless app and just for fun. 
Try pressing on the Tux to get some messages of the currently active assistant.

In the Tux-Chara Settings you are able to choose between 67 different characters. 
To close and remove the Tux-Chara from the Multitasking (home) view choose the "Close Overlay" from settings pulley menu.

Be aware to "Close Overlay" before uninstalling the app.
objects.summary: A small little assistant on the screen
objects.title: Tux-Chara

objects.description:
Let's say you are a teacher, sitting at home and correcting a test.  As usual you have determined the amount of points and measured the achieved score for every student.

Now teachertool comes into play and calculates the grade for every student, consistent with your assessment scale.

objects.description:
With VsDisplayClient you can organize and send image on a remote display.
The images will be shown as a slideshow.
When you install the app it is in DEMO mode and you can use full functionality but only with 2 images.

To unlock the app you need to get a license. For Jolla users I will provide 6 month free license if you ask :-) .

You can download the remote display application for Windows from:

http://download.ventisei.eu/IFW/vsdisplay_setup.zip

There will be available the MAC version as soon as possible.
objects.summary: Show image and text as a slideshow on a remote display.
objects.title: VsDisplayClient

objects.description:
This simple app lets you choose a RGB colour by mixing the portions of red, green and blue. Each colour has its slider ranging from 0 to 255. The current colour is displayed in a small box, the application cover page and also in full screen mode. For the ones memorizing their colour triplets, you also can fill them in â or use the text field for copy and paste.

HSL colours (hue, saturation and lightness) are also supported for displaying.
objects.summary:
choose a RGB colour from sliders for red, green and blue
â optionally: use HSL values (hue, saturation and lightness)
objects.title: Colour Chooser

objects.description:
Ancient Mahjong is a game you'll love for it's incredible atmosphere. It highlights the shape and softness of the wood tiles, as well as a simple and relaxing music.
You bring them in the appeal board game slowly, and you will discover the mental agility that you get to have with these solitaire seeking pairs of tiles.
Mahjong is an ancient board game in which you have to eliminate pieces of two by two, with the same drawing, and do not have another piece to your left or to your right. Nor you will have to be covered above.
They seem simple rules, and they are, unless you go slowly increasing the difficulty. That we propose in this Mahjong. A real challenge.
Just with all the boards and become a master.
objects.summary: Discover Ancient Mahjong, now in your mobile !!
objects.title: Ancient Mahjong

objects.changes:
- added now playing page
- added support for frontend HTTP service
- using system notifications now
- made app Jolla store compatible
objects.description:
I use MythTV as my home DVR (digital video recorder) and noticed that there is no native Sailfish app.

So, here it is: MythFish

With MythFish you can:
- control MythTV frontend
- wake up TV computer via Wake on Lan
- automatically waking up the TV computer and connecting to MythTV on start of the app
- see what is currently playing
- adjust volume and playing position via slider

Note: please report back any bugs or problems you encounter! Feedback would also be nice, so I can make the app even better!

Thanks to Garry Parker for the MythTV wallpaper image n (http://parker1.co.uk/).
objects.summary: MythFish is a remote control app for MythTV.
objects.title: MythFish

objects.description: The time is typically given as hh:mm:ss. Colours in RGB are given as #rrggbb. So in both cases we have a triplet of two digits. Let us combine these into colours specified by the time: #rrggbb = #hhmmss. That is what Hexclock does: It takes the current time and takes red for the hours, green for the minutes and blue for the seconds. So we have a "coloured representation" of the current time. That's it!
objects.summary: The Hexclock displays the current time hh:mm:ss as colour #hhmmss.
objects.title: Hexclock

objects.description:
Ever been alone with your Jolla phone in the dark? Don't be scared anymore!

Wait!  You are wondering why one more flashlight application?  Well, to make it short, I just could not find one that was Free/Libre/Open Source and not suspiciously big (1MB to switch a LED on and off, are you kidding me?).  This implementation is minimalist and licensed under the terms of the X11/MIT license.
objects.summary: A simple torch application.
objects.title: Torch

objects.description:
Now it is seen as a classic race game, you throw the dice and move gradually into the end of the board with various obstacles along the way. This is all about luck rather than strategy.

The rules of the game.

The object is to be the first person to reach to the end of the journey.

Roll the dice and move your counter one square for each spot on the dice. Then it is the next player's turn unless one of these things happens:

If your piece lands on a square where there is a figure of a goose, you go to the next goose, and you'll roll the dice again.

If you land on the bridge, go to the other bridge automatically.

If you you land on the well, or the prison, now miss two turns.

If you land on dead, black square, you have to go back to square 1 and start all over again!

To win you must reach final square exactly. If your dice roll is more than you need then you move in to final square and then bounce back out again, each spot on the dice is still one square in this move. If you land on any of the special squares while you are doing this then you must follow the normal instructions.

When you land on final exactly you are the winner!

The game of the goose is very addictive. Enjoy!!!
objects.summary: The object of the game of the goose is to be the first to reach the goal.
objects.title: The game of the Goose

objects.description:
With this app you can create, save and change a fully customized order list in an easy way. Once, the list is created, an order can be placed very quickly by selecting the desired items and setting a quantity. If it is completed, the list can be sent via an e-mail, right out of the app without any copy-paste action.
As soon as you have added at least one item to the order list, you can it also maintain by means of a common text editor. The backend order list file custOrderList.xml is stored in the folder:
.local/share/harbour-orderlist/harbour-orderlist/
objects.summary: Place quick an order by e-mail out of your fully customized order list.
objects.title: Order List

More information about titles and artists is shown while your music is playing. Furthermore, you can see the entire playlist, directly select individual songs and jump forward and backward in the list. If you have a particularly liking for an artist that was just played, you can compile an individual artist radio with just one click.

The Radio App is free of charge and offers the following options:
â¢	60+ different music channels

objects.description:
If you are a fan of sudoku games, you'll love this.
There are three levels of difficulty and is incredibly easy to play.
Play all the time without getting bored with the ease of thousands of sudokus.
Prove yourself in this easy and relaxing solitaire game.
For each number that you hit correctly, you'll see it as green, and for each number that you fail, you'll see it as red.
The sudoku puzzle consists of a grid of 9 blocks.
Each column must contain all of the numbers 1 through 9 and no two numbers in the same column can be the same.
Each row must contain all of the numbers 1 through 9 and no two numbers in the same row can be repeated.
Each block must contain all of the numbers 1 through 9 and no two numbers in the same block puzzle can be duplicated.
This is the secret of one of the puzzle most played around the world.
objects.summary: Prove yourself in this easy and relaxing sudoku.
objects.title: 10000 Sudoku

objects.description:
Watch Facebook videos in an organized and fashionable way, while you can create a sharable watchlists from Facebook videos.

Follow latest news of Syfy 12 Monkeys & Dark Matter series, conventions, premieres dates and more.

Get notified when your favorite Facebook pages publish new videos.


[ Fallery features ]:

- Find page: Search for a Facebook page and watch its videos.

- Create sharable watchlists from Facebook videos.

- Dedicated menus for:-

* Uploaded Videos.

* Watched Videos.

* All Liked Pages.

* Liked Movies Pages.

* Liked TV Shows Pages.



[ Android requested permissions ]:

- Network access: To access Facebook videos and pages.
- Read/ Write contents of SD card: To create WatchIt lists.



[ Facebook requested permissions ]:

- Public profile: To search for a Facebook page, watch Facebook videos, create sharable watchlists.

- User likes: To preview all Facebook pages you liked, including Movies pages and TV Shows pages.



[ Important Notes / Please be advised ]:

* This app is intended to be used by people aged 13+.

* Fallery requires to have a Facebook user account.

* Fallery doesn't have download video feature.

* Fallery is NOT related to Facebook official network / company. 

* Fallery is provided by a third party that does not relate to Facebook.

* Fallery is NOT endorsed or sponsored by Facebook official network / company. 

* Fallery is NOT endorsed or sponsored by Syfy official network / company. 

* All Facebook(TM) logos and trademarks (If Any) displayed in this app are property of Facebook.

* Fallery is developed using public Facebook SDK and APIs provided to global developers.

* This app doesn't collect nor transmit any of your data.

* If you have any question, feel free to drop us a line.

objects.description:
Put your *.gb roms to "/home/nemo/Documents/jboy_roms". The folder will be also created on first launch.
Some *.gbc roms can also be played with jBoy. Just rename them to *.gb and they can be started.

Features:
- Running most Gameboy roms
- Gamepad in theme colors or original color
- Option for emulation speed (5 Steps)
- Show FPS during emulation
- Option for original screen color or greyscale
- Logging on file (primary for bugfixing) to /home/nemo/Documents/jboy_log.txt
- Supporting MBC1, 2, 3 (with RTC) and 5
- Supporting up to 256 rombanks and 16 rambanks
- Original RAM saving when cart is using a battery (Creating *.sav file for *.gb file)
- Savefiles are (except RTC-Roms) compatible with other emulators
- Gameshark cheatcodes (Up to 25 per rom)
- Scale screen up to three times (Default size can also be set)
- Screenshots (saved in original resolution in "/home/nemo/Pictures/jboy_screenshots/%Timestamp%.png")
- Debugger (primary for bugfixing)
- Savestates (inclusive quicksave and -load)
- Sound support

Todo's:
- Improve debugger
- jBoy Advance

Do not run any software you don't own with jBoy.

objects.title: jBoy

objects.description:
Commander Keen is up to his "ears" in vegetables!

'90s PC action star Commander Keen is making his official Android debut! Trapped in the land of Tuberia, the usually fearless Keen is facing every child's worst nightmare: vegetables! Making his way through the dangerous (yet nourishing) surroundings, he must fight his way through hordes of vicious broccoli beasts, savage asparagus warriors, and a bushel of other leafy green nasties. His target? King Boobus Tuber, the fiercest spud of them all!

Talk about a food fight! Can you survive the perils of Rhubarb Rapids, the Melon Mines and other treacherous landscapes, on your way to the foreboding Castle Tuberia? Your strategy and quick reflexes could mean the difference between victory and a one way trip to the salad bar in the sky.

What are you waiting for? Get playing and help Commander Keen serve Boobus Tuber his just desserts!

Features:

+ Thirteen different levels
+ Three difficulty modes
+ High score table
+ Save your game at any time
+ Play using the touch screen or a gamepad

Keen Dreams is copyright 2013 Flat Rock Software, Super Fighter Team.
Commander Keen is a trademark of id Software.
objects.summary: Space hero Commander Keen prepares to "clean his plate" of vicious veggies!

objects.description:
For faster access, you can add stations as bookmarks. You can also search from bookmarks. (Scroll down for more info about usage)

This app provides a fast access to junat.net service. What's that?
"Junat.net, founded in fall 2015, provides you with real-time departure boards for all train stations reachable by Finnish railway services. You can use it on your computer, television set or mobile device."
More info at http://www.junat.net/en/ (check the bottom of the page)

How to use:
Navigation bar
- This app is actually a tiny browser, so the same logic aplies to the icons here
- Tap on arrows pointing left/right to go back/forward in page history
- Tap on circle shaped arrow to reload the page
- Tap on the train to return to junat.net
- Tap on the star to open bookmarks. You can add the current page to bookmarks or search from bookmarks using the pulley menu
Pulley menu
- You can see the current page's title, hide/show the navigation bar and toggle text size

This app is free and open source. You can find the source code at GitHub under a BSD licence.

Junat.net service/web page and the Junat.net logo/app icon are made by Joonas Rouhiainen. Contact: info@junat.net
objects.summary: Super fast WebView app for junat.net service. Get realtime train departure schedule updates for Finnish railway stations, complete with cancellation info.

objects.description:
SailTuner gets audio data from microphone, find the fundamental frequency, and then display the note, the octave and the deviation according to note reference and temperament.

It can also play a note, choosed with a scale flickable by user.

Pitch detection algorithm

The algorithm for fundamental frequency detection:

- high-pass filter (10Hz)
- zero-crossing detection with linear interpolation
- pattern recognition from regions, with time based standard deviation
- octave filtering: drop a frequency if already a higher octave for same note in some conditions
- post filter: wait few analyses to confirm or defect a note, and make a turning average for note deviation

The audio input rate is 16KHz ; audio frames are analysed every 2048 samples (128ms) and a note is confirmed after 3 chunks (384ms).

The note is found compared to an array of frequencies modulo one octave. The comparison array is built from a temperament and a 'A4' reference, default to 440Hz and equal temperament.

Temperaments

The temperaments are stored in .csv files. At beginning, the programm scans every .csv file in the data/ dir and makes temperament list.

Every line in a file is a temperament: the first column is the temperament name, and columns 2 to 13 are the notes frequencies from C-4 to B-4

Note player

A frequency player module makes the signal at given frequency. There are 3 waveforms in the code:

- Sinus
- Triangle (ie pair harmonics)
- Sinus + harmonics (1/n x f(n))

Since the speaker of Jolla phone have very low intensity for low frequencies, the third solution is used, and the intensity is higher for lower notes.
objects.summary: SailTuner is a chromatic multi-temperament instrument tuner and notes player for Sailfish OS.
objects.title: SailTuner

objects.description:
Zimpedia is an offline reader for Wikipedia and other Wiki projects. It provides localhost server that serves content of local ZIM repository.

The ZIM is an open file format that stores wiki content for offline usage. Its primary focus is on the contents of Wikipedia but also other Wiki projects like Wikivoyage are supported.

To make Zimpedia work, put your favorite ZIM files to any folder under your device home directory or SD card.

If you are planning to use ZIM file larger than 4GB, make sure that your SD card is formatted in Ext4 or Btrfs filesystem.

The collection of nice wikis in ZIM format can be downloaded from:
- Kiwix project website: http://www.kiwix.org/wiki/Content_in_all_languages
- Wikimedia repository: https://dumps.wikimedia.org/other/kiwix/zim/wikipedia/

Zimpedia uses and completely relies on open source components developed by Open ZIM project (http://www.openzim.org).
objects.summary: Offline reader for Wikipedia and other Wiki projects
objects.title: Zimpedia

objects.description:
Schwarzenmaker is yet another workout app with focus on media consumption while training.

Rationale:
  - Workouts only make sense when performed regularly
  - Workouts have to be stressfull to achieve results
  - Stressful recurring events are likely to be procrastinated
  - Media consumption is fun (depending on media quality)
  --> Experience punishment and reward isochronically

Features:
  - Standalone or background mode for media consumption while performing exercises
  - Manage multiple workouts (e.g. standard / shortened)
  - Create workouts by exercise name, duration, optional descriptions and pauses
  - Rearrange exercises
  - Audible exercise timer
  - Avoid screen blanking

objects.description:
Help the witch to get the potion for the spell to remove the dark.
Connect all the magical bubbles in this enchanting game.
You will enjoy, because you will be instantly bewitched by these extraordinary graphics.

If you release the eight magic potions you will overcome each level.
The origins of this game have been lost in the mists of time, but is said to have been inspired by Mahjong.
Throughout the years, it has stood the test of time, and its longevity has made it popular again today, as the game has enjoyed a new resurgence with people of all ages.
It is interesting, fun, and stimulates the cognitive processes of the brain.

The goal is to help the witch to remove all enchanted spheres on the board.
Two bubbles with same picture can be removed at a time.
Two spheres can be removed only if they can be connected with a maximum of three lines.
You can find eight kinds of special items, they will give you more points..

There is no time limit, so you can play this game quietly.
The game is lost if no moves are available and bubbles are left on the board, or is won if the player successfully removes all the amulets.

objects.description:
This is a port of the famous Connect4 game (Puissance 4).

You can play human vs IA, human vs human or IA vs IA (for fun!).  There is a strong IA using a minimax search tree with alpha-beta pruning, and fast and accurate heuristic computation, with 5 levels for IA force.

The IA configures its strategie itself at each beginning of game or after config change, to avoid doing the sames plays every time. Depending of the force, random takes part of IA decision. You can play against it without being boring !

Translated in french, english, german and spanish.

Licence: GPLv3
Author: Louis-Joseph Fournier
First release date: 2015-10-18
objects.summary: Connect4 game with configurable and strong IA
objects.title: SailConnect4

objects.description:
FreeOTP adds a second layer of security for your online accounts. This works by generating one-time passwords on your mobile devices which can be used in conjunction with your normal password to make your login nearly impossible to hack. These passwords can be generated even when your phone is in airplane mode.

FreeOTP works with many of the great online services you already use, including Google, Facebook, Evernote, GitHub and many more! FreeOTP also may work for your private corporate security if they implement the standardized TOTP or HOTP protocols. This includes great enterprise solutions like FreeIPA.

FreeOTP is open source and free software! Licensed under the Apache 2.0 license, you can obtain the source code for FreeOTP at https://fedorahosted.org/freeotp for review or modification. Contributions are welcome!
objects.summary: FreeOTP adds a second layer of security for online accounts. It works by generating one-time passwords on your mobile devices which can be used in conjunction with your normal password.
objects.title: FreeOTP Authenticator

objects.description:
Relax and enjoy one of the great board games played in Asia in bygone eras.
The game's graphics and great music will help you enter the relaxed state necessary for these types of ancient Chinese puzzles.
There's no rush, in this Mahjong game you're not playing against the clock. A calm approach is best, as problem solving and visual acuity are essential in Mahjong solitaire games. 

Rules of the game:

Make combinations of identical pieces until you have emptied each board.
You will only be able to select and eliminate pieces which are not covered from above, and whose left or right side is free.

Features:

-Completely free.
-Top-quality graphics and effects.
-Many different tiles.
-Piano music appropriate to the style of game.
-Many different levels whose difficulty increases as you progress.

The game has various buttons which will make each round easier and more exciting.
-Help button for when you can't find any identical pieces.
-Another button obscures blocked pieces.
-You can use a button to shuffle the pieces when there are no possible combinations.
objects.summary: Train your brain and unlock its full potential with this amazing Mahjong game.

objects.description:
This is miniLock Chrome application ported as a native client for SailfishOS. You can use it to send and receive confidential files with other miniLock users. Secure file encryption and hashing algorithms (scrypt, curve25519, 256 bit key length) are applied to your files. You public miniLock-ID can be copied to clipboard or displayed and exported as QR code.

Citation from the miniLock README: 

"miniLock is a small, portable file encryption software. The idea behind its design is that passphrase memorized by the user, along with their email address, can act as a complete, portable basis for a persistent public key identity and provide a full substitute for other key pair models, such as having the key pair stored on disk media (the PGP approach) [...]

miniLock allows the user to encrypt files to other miniLock users via their miniLock IDs and decrypt files sent to them. miniLock's encryption format supports encrypting a single file to multiple recipients with a negligible increase in file size. Another feature is that analyzing a miniLock-encrypted file does not yield the miniLock IDs or identities of the sender or the recipient(s). Upon decryption, a legitimate recipient will be able to know and verify the identity of the sender, but will still be unable to determine the identity of other potential recipients."

IMPORTANT NOTE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Please note that as a current limitation only small documents (up to 50 MB) can be de- and encrypted w/out crashing the application. This is because files are processed in-memory by go-minilock package. Eventually this will be fixed with a later version as go-minilock needs to be forked and modified for stream processing.
objects.summary: miniLock encryption software for confidential file exchange
objects.title: miniLock

objects.description:
Resize for SailfishOS is an easy to use application that allows you to scale JPEG images to any given size and saves them back to disc.  This can be convenient if you want to send pictures via mail, but don't want to have big attachments included. On the other hand small pictures can be upscaled by keeping as much detail as possible by selecting one of the six supported interpolation functions.

A privacy feature had been included to save a copy of the original image file with metadata, i.e. EXIF, custom tags from image editor, GPS position aso. removed.

Resize is available for Jolla phone and tablet.

Whats in the box?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You can scale images by keeping aspect ratio of width or height or use any dimensions you like. Six interpolation functions allow you to keep details of the scaled image. You can select between nearest-neighbor, bilinear, bicubic, Mitchell-Netravali, lanczos2 and lanczos3. Default preset parameters allow you you quickly scale images to 320, 640, 1024, 1920 or 4096 px height. The JPEG compression rate can be selected between 10 - 100% for smaller or bigger output files.
The original image file plus the scaled output file can be viewed and zoomed. Saved files will be located at ~/Pictures/harbour-resize/ folder. The picture filebrowser used for selecting source image allows sorting of files either by name or date. A privacy feature let you save a copy of the original imagefile, but with metadata removed (no location data, timestamps and other information).

Please note:
~~~~~~~~~~
- Due the fact of harbour QML policy images can not be transferred via mail or other communication channels. You have to select them manually from gallery application.

- If you start a long running scale thread your device must be awake to finish image processing. If device falls asleep (wake lock, suspend) the image processing thread will stall and only resume once the device is awoken.

- Resizing images takes processing power and your battery might run down faster as usual.

- Displaying a large list of thumbnails from image browser page might kill your application because of low memory killer kicks in.

objects.description:
The main purpose of this application is to provide you with a rough estimate of how long the device will keep running on battery power. The data is visualized in the form of a graph as well as a separate event log. This is accomplished by storing battery information periodically. Please keep in mind that the average consumption is calculated based on the last 24 hours.
Do not expect to get an accurate projection two minutes after starting the application. You need to wait a little longer - and keep the program running in the background.

On the battery graph you can see when the device is active (display is turned on) and if an external power supply is connected.

The application cover can switch between two different modes:
- current battery state including the remaining time
- average power consumption including a graph showing the last two days
objects.summary: Graphical log showing the average battery consumption.
objects.title: Battery Log

objects.description:
Conversations is an open source Jabber / XMPP client for Android compatible smart phones.

Design principles
â¢ Be as beautiful and easy to use as possible without sacrificing security or privacy
â¢ Rely on existing, well established protocols
â¢ Require as little permissions as possible

Features
â¢ End-to-end encryption with either OMEMO, OTR or OpenPGP
â¢ Sending and receiving images
â¢ Pictures / Avatars for your Contacts
â¢ Syncs with desktop client
â¢ Conferences (with support for bookmarks)
â¢ Address book integration
â¢ Multiple Accounts / unified inbox
â¢ Very low impact on battery life


XMPP Features
Conversations works with every XMPP server out there. However XMPP is an extensible protocol. These extensions are standardized as well in so called XEPâs. Conversations supports a couple of those to make the overall user experience better. There is a chance that your current XMPP server does not support these extensions. Therefore to get the most out of Conversations you should consider either switching to an
XMPP server that does or - even better - run your own XMPP server for you and your friends.
These XEPs are - as of now:

â¢ XEP-0065: SOCKS5 Bytestreams (or mod_proxy65). Will be used to transfer files if both parties are behind a firewall (NAT).
â¢ XEP-0163: Personal Eventing Protocol for avatars
â¢ XEP-0191: Blocking command lets you blacklist spammers or block contacts without removing them from your roster.
â¢ XEP-0198: Stream Management allows XMPP to survive small network outages and changes of the underlying TCP connection.
â¢ XEP-0280: Message Carbons which automatically syncs the messages you send to your desktop client and thus allows you to switch seamlessly from your mobile client to your desktop client and back within one conversation.
â¢ XEP-0237: Roster Versioning mainly to save bandwidth on poor mobile connections
â¢ XEP-0313: Message Archive Management synchronize message history with the server. Catch up with messages that were sent while Conversations was offline.
â¢ XEP-0352: Client State Indication lets the server know whether or not Conversations is in the background. Allows the server to save bandwidth by withholding unimportant packages.
â¢ XEP-0363: HTTP File Upload allows you to share files in conferences and with offline contacts. Requires an additional component on your server.
objects.summary: An encrypted, user friendly XMPP instant messaging client  optimized to provide an unique mobile experience
objects.title: Conversations (Jabber / XMPP)

objects.description:
Fate a birth has awarded to our protagonist distinctive feature.
Â 
He had a very strong skull.
It is believed Russia, or rather Nizhny Tagil, is home to unique people.
Â 
When he learned to crawl, his parents had to change the upholstered furniture in the bedroom. The reason was that the baby, while crawling, his head has managed to demolish all the legs off the bed and ruin a pretty durable sofa. When he started to walk, there were times when his family dined on the floor. And you do not think they did not live in one of the Asian countries. Just when the baby accidentally touched the head table or a chair, they flew into splinters. In school, our hero teacher begged him not to lift out from under the table fallen pens and pencils, but as they say, destiny can not be fooled, to the prom ball 19 desks were destroyed.
Â 
If you've ever heard of someone called "steel noggin", "demolition man" or "Krushmor" it certainly talked about our hero. As you can imagine, in the ranks of the VDV it was not equal for breaking bottles of champagne, as well as beat of rail spikes into the wall. In this respect he even has a diploma. But do not think that our hero is different feeble-mindedness. Just the opposite. We know exactly inspired victory over Kasparov chess computer Deep Blue suffered a crushing defeat from our hero. And then left to wonder: what if he lost his former skill, or simply afraid of our hero.
Â 
In our game HeadBang - a nickname that liked the main character more than any other (alas, the personal data about him, we can not disclose), the guy is committed to what he does best - destroy everything in its path.
Â 
In the game you expect a lot of different levels, and each new level - a new job. How else? We have said before that our hero is very smart, so without assignments do not. An additional difficulty lies in the fact that each task is given a certain time, during which the need to perform this task. There are even some levels where you can feel the plight of the ball game the system "Arkanoid". In addition to collecting coins and destruction of various blocks you have the opportunity to participate in competitions for speed with the best runners of modern times, however, if you strongly impudent, super-powerful bosses will beat you senseless.
(By the way, one of them, somehow reminds one very stupid politician).
And yet, as they say, HeadBang is unbeatable, but the Wall of Death is still harder. If you se the Wall, run away fom it. Run as fast as you can without remore - the health is more important.
Â 
At the disposal of our hero, besides his excess capacity, there are 52 unique helmet, many of which you will seem very familiar. However, to get everything at once in this game does not work, and only as far as finding a new helmet they will be added to the collection of our hero (he proudly calls her gallery helmets), where you can admire them.
Â 
And last but an important. The levels of our game populated civilians and little animals (girl, grandmother, skateboarder, a dog and a cat). Please do not hurt animals - take care of Mother Nature!
objects.summary: High-speed 2D platformer.
objects.title: HeadBang

objects.description:
Ivy is an interpreter for an APL-like language. The original command line application has been written by Rob Pike, the inventor of Go language. It is a mighty tool for numeric calculations with big numbers. 

Unlike APL, the input is ASCII and the results are exact (but see the next paragraph). It uses exact rational arithmetic so it can handle arbitrary precision. Values to be input may be integers (3, -1), rationals (1/3, -45/67) or floating point values (1e3, -1.5 (representing 1000 and -3/2)).

Some functions such as sqrt are irrational. When ivy evaluates an irrational function, the result is stored in a high-precision floating-point number (default 256 bits of mantissa). Thus when using irrational functions, the values have high precision but are not exact. 

Whats in the box?
-------------------------
Ivys original command line parser and scanner stack had been put into a simple SailfishOS Silica GUI application. You can save your current calculator session and restore it later. You can restart (clear) the calculator context and start a new session without restarting the application. A session can also be exported to your Documents folder (subfolder harbour-ivyfish/Ivysession_<timestamp>.txt). Included from the help page are two demo sessions from a presentation by Rob Pike to show bignumber calculations done with Ivy. From the cover page you can copy the last result into clipboard, from the applications calculation list you can long-push an item and copy it to clipboard or input line. GUI had been translated into German and will be selected automagically based on your phones locale. However command line and Ivy Godoc texts remain English.

Happy number crunching on your Jolla!
objects.summary: Ivy Bignum Calculator makes calculations with big numbers a bliss!
objects.title: Ivy

objects.description:
Sailabag is a native wallabag client.

From the wallabag homepage:
"wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages. Unlike other services, wallabag is free (as in freedom) and open source.

With this application you will not miss content anymore. Click, save, read it when you want. It saves the content you select so that you can read it when you have time."

On instructions on how to setup a wallabag server and how to use the client visit: http://yurumi.github.io/harbour-sailabag

  - Share articles via e-mail / clipboard

objects.description:
Picross (Also known as Griddlers or Nonogram) is a logic game.
You'll have to discover the picture hidden behind numbers, corresponding to the length of every colored "cell group".
The only unknown is the space between every cell group, and this is where the logic appears.
Levels (At the moment, there are 40+ levels) are sorted by difficulty, and you have to complete one difficulty to unlock the next one.

TRANSLATION
We need your help to translate this project!
Take a look on www.transifex.com/baspar/harbour-picross/

CONTROLS: 
    - Click on a cell: toggle between Full cell -> Hint cell  -> Empty cell
   - Press-and-hold on a cell to copy its content to other cells
 

FEATURES:
    - Auto save/reload
    - Guess Mode
    - Locked levels
    - Correctness indicators (Green = corresponds)
    - Pinch-to-Zoom
    - Line/column auto-complete (Full green = fill with hint, orange = fill with full)
    - Press-and-hold to copy
 

PLANNED FEATURES:
    - Colored picross
    - Mega picross
    - More and more levels

SOURCE:
You can find source of this program on GitHub : https://github.com/Baspar/harbour-picross
objects.summary: Picross is a logic game where you have to discover 8-bits pictures.
objects.title: Picross

objects.description:
Roll five dice and try to make sets that score points. The goal is to get the highest score.The game is made up of 15 turns. A turn starts by rolling all five dice. You can re-roll some or all of the dice up to twice. Select dice to stop them from being re-rolled. Points are scored by summing the dice that make each set. 

In multiplayer mode each player has to enter his name and throw a dice (by clicking the enter key) to decide the order of the players. Only when the order is decided the game can be started. 

High scores are saved. 

The app is developed by Robert Ancell for Ubuntu Phone. I ported it to Sailfish and added multiplay.

Have fun!

objects.description:
The game originated in China, but, is now enjoyed all over the world. The goal of Mahjong is to eliminate all of the tiles from the board by finding their pairs. Not only is it fun to play Mahjong, but, it is also great for your brain! So, what are you waiting for? Keep your brain healthy and have fun! Play our free Mahjong game now!

The rules of Mahjong are simple. Here are the basics of how to play Mahjong solitaire:

Look for pairs of tiles. Keep in mind that you can only remove a tile if it has space on either its left or its right. If it has a tile on both sides, you cannot remove it.
Once you have found a pair of tiles that both have space on one side, remove them from the board.
As you remove tiles from the board, new pairs will become visible and you can remove them as well.
Continue removing tiles until there are either no tiles left or you have no more legal moves. If you remove all of the tiles from the board, you win.
The traditional Mahjong game consists on several pieces appearing four times each. You can find less traditional games where pairs can only be combined once.
Be careful! Not all pairs are the right ones. Think before you match pieces, or you may be blocked and have to begin.
objects.summary: Mahjong is one of the best strategy games of all time.
objects.title: Mahjong Dynasty

objects.description:
This App helps you find routes which can be used to travel from one location to another in Tokyo city by using Tokyo Metro and Toei Subway.

The search provides you with a list of alternative routes which can be used to travel from the source to destination station. It provides you with the number of line changes and station stops involved in each route. 

This is an alternative to finding train routes by looking for lines and station connections on the Map. The App determines the routes in a manner which is quite similar to how any person will interpret the routes from the Map.

You can also view the detailed station list for each train line in Tokyo. You can long press on any station name from the list to see it on maps. 

The App interface is available in English and Japanese languages.

This App can work completely offline.

Or use this app: https://openrepos.net/content/schturman/android-apps-notifications

* Say Anything - Send high-quality group, text, picture, and video messages, all without SMS and MMS fees.

* Be Yourself - Use your existing phone number and address book. There are no separate logins, usernames, passwords, or PINs to manage or lose.

* Stay Private - We cannot read your messages, and no one else can either. Everything is always end-to-end encrypted and painstakingly engineered in order to keep your communication safe.

* Get Organized - Archive functionality makes it easy to keep track of the conversations that matter to you right now.

* Pay Nothing - The development team is supported by community donations and grants. There are no advertisements, and it doesn't cost anything to use.

objects.description:
Features:
- browse music library
- add songs to local playing queue
- browse and play/delete/create new playlists
- cache music files locally (checks/downloads all files in queue on playing)
- play/pause/skip from cover

Important limitations:
- caching (and thus playing) currently only supports mp3 (by default subsonic converts everything to mp3 for streaming)
- currently no automatic cache management. You need to keep track of the applications cache directory yourself. Settings include an option to manually clear the cache.
- no support for headset controls
- cache and queue are not yet compatible with switching servers. Better to clean up both on switching because track ids on servers will most likely overlap.

Requires access to a subsonic music server!
(official subsonic demo server is preconfigured)

objects.description:
An insanely addictive classic physics based game! In this colorful game, tap your finger anywhere to generate a cute random object that will land on a base landing plate. Seems simple? Not so. The base plate in delicately balanced on a wobbly circle which unbalances easily. Your aim is to add objects to the platform in such a way that it stays balanced. If that wasnât enough, you have to shoot the sad smiley before it reaches your rectangle or less you will lose points. Earn points along the way which will ultimately translate to coins which can be used to buy some really awesome stuff (only available in final version)! 
This game is the first game of my new inaugural â100Linersâ series, in which all the game source code ranges from about 100-500 lines. This is a beta version app and may contain bugs. They are going to be fixed subsequently and lots of other additions and improvements are going to be made as I release the final version of this app. This is my first app and I hope to make much better and many more apps. Please support me and help in releasing the second game in the 100Liners series, sometime later this year, which is going to be a completely open source project. The details would be uploaded soon.
objects.summary: In this deceptively simple and awesomely addictive game, balance a colorful platform on a wobbly and slippery circle by generating cute objects to balance on the platform. Earn coins along the way.

The difficulty increases gradually, and there are levels where you have to think that way join fruits, because depending on how you do it, you will get various power ups.

- The vertical, linking five get it.
- The pump, which is obtained by joining six.

The screens do not have time to finish them, but if you finish it quickly you'll get more stars.
You will be able to overcome this challenge of 100 levels?
If you want, you can challenge your friends through the leaderboards.
In this game, all lifes are free.
The fun in this game to link fruit is assured.

-Colorful and tasty fruits.
-Levels are a big mental challenge.
-Very funny and easy to play.

objects.description:
After you select 'silent' profile, the program will ask you how long you want this setting to last (max.12 hours). When this set time has passed, your regular ringing profile will be restored.

Very handy for people who often need to silence the ringer for a while, for example for the duration of a meeting, a movie or a short nap.

The application auto-cancels in 15 seconds unless interacted with.

NOTE about Jolla Store restrictions: the feature is only available after launching the application. You can close the application after running it once and RingingRestorer will stay active. But after each reboot of phone you will need to again launch the application yourself. If you want to remove the application, you must reboot the phone after uninstalling.

If you want a version without these restrictions go to OpenRepos and find RingingRestorer from there.

Icon for RingingRestorer created by ssahla

If you like RingingRestorer and think it's worth me getting a beer or a small cookie, please donate:

objects.description:
Your goal is remove all runes from the board. You need to match two tiles by connecting them with a pathway, but only two matching runes can be removed at a time.
They can be removed only if they can be connected by a path through empty spaces which consists of horizontal and vertical paths and at most two turns.
Atlantis Runes is a new and exciting game without time limit.
The path can go through the spaces outside the starting board.
The game is lost if no moves are available and tiles are left on the board, or is won if the player successfully removes all the tiles.
The mythical island of Atlantis has often been depicted in books, films, games and other creative works of popular culture.
objects.summary: Remove all runes from the board !!!
objects.title: Atlantis Runes

objects.description:

The search provides you with a list of alternative routes which can be used to travel from the source to destination station. It provides you with the number of service changes and station stops involved in each route.

You can also view the detailed station list for each subway service in Newyork. 
Also, you can long press on any station name from the list to see it on online maps. 

This app can work completely offline (without internet).

objects.description:
Summer is here! This summer we have brought our fast-food restaurant game to the beach, to be among the palm trees and a lot of sun.

Don't miss your moment to choose the ingredients to bring to the boys and girls that are coming.

Serve delicious hamburgers and beach drinks.

When you finish a level you will know how to make new dishes to fill the restaurant using new and tasty recipes.

You will also be able to see on many levels of the game how to switch to a spot on another beach.

In this improved version, you will have to look for all the missing ingredients, in order to replace them.

Spend your money wisely when you buy food, since if you spend too much you will not be able to move to the next level.

If you are a fan of restaurant games, you'll love this version of Diner Restaurant. Great, fresh graphics.

The increasing difficulty will require you to be even more skillful as you play, and will ensure you have fun for hours.
objects.summary: Serve delicious hamburgers and beach drinks.

objects.description:
Textractor is an OCR (optical character recognition) application. It extracts text from images and PDF files.

You can either take a picture with the camera or you can select an image from the gallery. Textractor will then process the image. Additionally you can select also a PDF file and extract text from it. After processing you can copy the text or do something else with the results.

Please read usage hints inside application or documentation at the application website to get best results.

You have to download at least one language file upon first use to get going. Textractor supports 62 different languages.

Textractor is based on Tesseract OCR engine and Leptonica image processing library.
objects.summary: Optical character recognition application.
objects.title: Textractor

objects.description:
Finally, the game is back! The second part of one of the fast-food restaurant games that we've all been waiting for.

This time you'll be behind the bar and you'll have to be very adept at picking the ingredients to serve customers. You can serve burgers, drinks and the odd dessert.
You will unlock new recipes as you advance through each level. At various levels of the game, you can also see the restaurant decorated, like at Christmas or Halloween. Beware!!! Food can run out.
This time you'll have to control the shopping cart during play, because if you spend too much money on food orders, you will have too many expenses and not pass the level.
In this restaurant game, the graphics have been specially designed to please people of all ages. Great care has been put into the sound effects and music and the difficulty level is a good fit.

objects.description:
modRana is a flexible GPS navigation system for mobile Linux devices.

Currently supported features @ Sailfish:

* showing current position and direction of travel on the map
* map tile caching (each tile is downloaded only once)
*  fast and robust tile loading and downloading
* persistent map overlay support
* a great lot of various map layers
* simple yet powerful online point to point routing support
* long click a point on the map for quick routing
* address search, powered Nominatim and based on OpenStreeMap data
*Wikipedia search
* local search
* track recording to the GPX format is supported
* page displaying current speed in nice friendly letters
* detailed GPS info display
* compass rose can be displayed on the map screen
objects.summary: ModRana is a full featured flexible navigation system.
objects.title: modRana

objects.description:
PhotoFunia is the best way to add a spark to your photos, make them special and more original. In only a few seconds an amazing photo collage is ready, absolutely free. PhotoFunia is so straight forward to use, that anyone, at any age, can use it with ease.
Would you like to see your picture on the cover of a magazine or on advertising billboards of Times Square? How amazing will it be to see your portrait on the walls of Louvre or Hermitage museums? Want to try out an astronaut or a Santa suit? Or you prefer something more exotic, just like a dancer at the Rio's carnival? Excited to find out how good you look with a witch's hat or a queen's crown on? Perhaps you're just looking for a nice frame for your photos on a special occasion?
Make your own mark on the sand or write graffiti text on the wall, carve your name on the ground or create your very own road sign using our fantastic text effects. To add shadows, age your photo or render it black and white just visit Filters category.
A myriad of hundreds of effects is waiting for you. Our effects library is always expanding and every week you can find something new. As previously mentioned, using PhotoFunia couldn't be simpler: pick you desired effect, upload your photo and voilÃ ! All in all in just two simple steps and you have your very own work of art ready to save, send via email or share with your friends on a social site.
Take PhotoFunia with you wherever you go and create stunning images on your mobile or tablet with our great mobile app.
Note: All image manipulation is performed in the cloud therefore WiFi or 3G connection is required for application to work.
objects.summary: PhotoFunia is the best way to add a spark to your photos, make them special and more original. In only a few seconds an amazing photo collage is ready, absolutely free.
objects.title: PhotoFunia

Passes close to the relevant time are highlighted. It's also possible to highlight passes close to relevant coordinates (check settings). The top highlighted pass is shown on the cover, with the cover action opening the pass directly. Also, highlighted passes are shown in the event view, while the app is running. Calendar entries may be made, if the pass contains a relevant time.

objects.description:
Your goal is simply to reorder the numbers.

There isn't many levels for the moment. But I am working on it and I promise there will be plenty soon.

There is currently :

* 8 tutorial levels : To learn how to play

* 20 designed levels : difficulty rise up progressively, and you win star(s) depending of how close you are from the best solution

* 160 seeded levels : these levels are generated using seed, so they are the same for everyone, but difficulty is randomly distributed and not in my control. You cannot win star there since I have no efficient way to know for sure what is the best solution

objects.description: Search the challenge one of our amazing mahjong games for free and enjoy the ancient tradition of Chinese puzzles. In the game, you go play different boards with increasing difficulty and for hours enjoying this wonderful zen mahjong. It has many levels. The mah jong, also called Mahjongg many sites are easy to play as the pair of rules that have known. The player is challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board. Find  matching pairs of cards, provided that it has no top and one attached to the left or right. The goal of each level of this ancient Chinese game is to remove all pieces paired the board to move on to play the next board. If during the game do not know that choice piece, quiet. You can press the Help button (HighLight), to know that parts are still being free. This style of mahjong for phones or tablets offers all the traditional gameplay and addictive puzzle but totally renovated thanks to its high quality graphics and incredible music and sounds.
objects.summary: One of our amazing mahjong games. Enjoy the ancient tradition of Chinese puzzles
objects.title: Zen Mahjong

objects.changes: Improved performance
objects.description:
Aztec Returns is exactly like Shisen-sho games, but with spectacular graphics based on the ancient Aztec culture. In many places, it is also called "four rivers". The game is based on Japanese tiles, similar to Mahjong tokens, only this time the tokens have been replaced by spectacular Aztec hieroglyphics tiles. The goal is to eliminate identical pairs of tokens, until every board is empty, like Mahjong games.

The rules are simple. As already mentioned, in this millenary ancient game of solitaire only two matching tiles can be removed at a time. They are only removed if it is possible to connect up to three horizontal or vertical lines, a U-shape, I-shape, L-shape or Z-shape, provided that the lines do not run into another piece and only crosses open spaces. If you do not have any more moves or all the tiles are removed from the board, the game ends, or you go to the next board.

The relaxing music will make you feel as though you are inside of the game, to go through all levels with maximum concentration.

This Shisen-sho has the playability of any Mahjong, Shanghai or any Chinese puzzle game, in addition to many levels; and all this for free.
objects.summary: Aztec Returns is exactly like Shisen-sho games, but with spectacular graphics.
objects.title: Aztec Returns

objects.description:
Batagur uses hashing of master password and service tokens to generate passwords. 
Additionally to the master and token that you have to enter everytime you generate a password you can customize a few parameters:
* salt - a custom text between master and token when hashed
* number of iterations the string will be SHA512 hashed
* length of your password - from 1 to 79 characters

For a javascript implementation visit the project website.
objects.summary: Password management with hashes and without storing passwords ;)
objects.title: Batagur

objects.description:
A simple Kanji dictionary/trainer for SailfishOS (Japanese).

This app contains the following features:

 * Over 10,000 Kanji based on KANJIDIC2 (JIS X 0208, JIS X 0212, JIS X 0213)
 * Select multiple search criteria
 * Save Kanji for training
 * Manage saved Kanji through lists

This app uses the KANJIDIC2 dictionary file. This file is the property of the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group, and is used in conformance with the Group's licence.

KANJIDIC2: http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/~jwb/kanjidic2/
Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group: http://www.edrdg.org/
License information: http://www.edrdg.org/edrdg/licence.html

The SKIP (System of Kanji Indexing by Patterns) system for ordering kanji was developed by Jack Halpern (Kanji Dictionary Publishing Society), and is used with his permission.

Kanji Dictionary Publishing Society: http://www.kanji.org/
objects.summary: Kanji dictionary/trainer for SailfishOS
objects.title: Kanji

objects.description:
BE AWARE:
This app is in Norwegian, as it is intended for doctors and other health care workers in Norway.

DESCRIPTION:
LegeAppen is a useful and intuitive app for doctors and other health care workers in Norway, optimized for both phones and tablets.

With LegeAppen you can replace lots of apps and websites with just one app.

FEATURES:
* Medications, substances and favorites
* All the most important encyclopedias in one place
* Diseases and treatments, with search in the most important encyclopedias
* Emergency room handbook (links to lvh.no)
* Interaction analysis
* Poisonings information
* National guidelines
* Clinical trials
* ATC registry
* ICD-10
* Pharmaceutical companies
* Pharmacies
* Scales
* Notifications from The Norwegian Medicines Agency
* Calculators
* Notes
* Tasks
* Save articles
* Various other features

Note: Several encyclopedias require that you are located in Norway for free access

PERMISSIONS LEGEAPPEN REQUIRES:
* In-app purchases: To be able to donate money to the developer
* Identity: To be able to collect anonymous information to the developer that is very useful
* Location: To be able to find your position in relation to a pharmacy
* Photos/Media/Files: To be able to store files with content that is presented in the app
* Camera: To be able to scan barcodes

Your position is not logged in any way.

DISCLAIMER:
LegeAppen is developed by a private person, and even though the content in the app is fetched from recognized sources, the developer can not the be held responsible for decisions taken based on information found in this app.

LICENSE:
LegeAppen is non-commercial free software with open source code. LegeAppen makes use of content freely available on the Internet.

LegeAppen is licensed under The GNU General Public License, version 3.

CREDITS:
* Stethoscrope icon from Icons8: http://icons8.com/web-app/957/Stethoscope

"Human knowledge belongs to the world"
objects.summary: Collects many useful resources for doctors and health care workers in Norway
objects.title: LegeAppen

objects.description:
Kodimote is an application that puts you in control of your XBMC or Kodi box using mobile devices. You can browse the library, create playlists and view/control the currently played media.

These include:
- Browse Audio/Video Library/Filesystem, Pictures and TV Channels, including add-on sources
 - Play Audio/Video/Pictures
 - Add/Remove songs/videos to/from playlist
 - Key input (Left, Right, OK, Back etc.)
 - Play/Pause, Skip, Fast Forward/Backward, Repeat, Shuffle
 - Subtitle and audio track selection
 - Volume (allows you to define custom commands if you have an external amplifier that cannot controlled directly through XBMC).
 - Automatically lowers volume or pauses videos and music during calls.
 - Wake on Lan to wake up your XBMC or Kodi host
 - Media artwork and extended details

The supported versions of XBMC are both v12 Frodo, v13 Gotham, and Kodi v14 Helix

This application uses the XBMC/Kodi API but is not affiliated with Team Kodi and/or the XBMC Foundation in any way.
objects.summary: Unofficial remote control application for XBMC and Kodi
objects.title: Kodimote

objects.description:
SuperGenPass is a different kind of password solution. Instead of storing your passwords on your hard disk or online - where they are vulnerable to theft and data loss - SuperGenPass uses a hash algorithm to transform a master password into unique, complex passwords for the Web sites you visit.

The original SuperGenPass by Chris Zarate is a JavaScript bookmarklet running in your browser.
SuperSailPass is an inofficial SuperGenPass implementation for SailfishOS. Implementations for other platforms are available, including Android, iOS, Chrome browser and bash.

Please note: this app is currently in beta state. If you have questions, problems or suggestions, please file a new issue on the project's GitHub page: https://github.com/jklingen/harbour-supersailpass/issues - thanks :)
objects.summary:
A SuperGenPass implementation for SailfishOS

SuperSailPass uses a hash algorithm to transform a master password into unique, complex passwords for any website, fully compatible with SuperGenPass.
objects.title: SuperSailPass

objects.changes: initial release
objects.description:
Demand more. Have it all at your fingertips.
Speed - Data - Voice - Quality

With the ad-free RadioOpt Traffic Monitor you can check your 3G / 4G speed and keep an eye on network coverage and data usage on your smartphone. 

Speed test

The speed test of the RadioOpt Traffic Monitor shows you the speed and latency of your 3G, 4G and Wi-Fi network on a speedometer, separated into upload, download and ping speed. After each test you receive an assessment of your result, comparing it to users in your region. So you can find out if you surf the net faster or slower than the rest of the world. All speed tests are archived with all details and can be accessed anytime and viewed on the integrated map view. The archived data helps you to recognize speed variations quickly.

Coverage

Discover the reasons of bad network performance with Traffic Monitor! The coverage map displays network availability depending on your current position. The network coverage of each provider is shown on the coverage map for select countries, with more countries added over time.

Traffic Monitor is for free and does not contain any ads! We are happy about positive ratings and your feedback :-). Thank you!
objects.summary: 3G 4G Wi-Fi speedtest for your Jolla phone
objects.title: Traffic Monitor + speed test

objects.description:
ForgetItNot has two gamemodes:

Classic - Play two levelsets with 120 levels and more than 100 bonus levels. Each level has a time limit, it get's harder step by step.

Arcade - Play a game with auto balanced levels with the same two levelsets. There is no level time limit, but a global arcade time limit. Remember as many sets as you can.


Currently there are the following two levelsets:

Remember one - You see a few icons and have to remember them. Then when you remember it, press the "got it" button. You are presented 9 icons and have to choose the icon, that was already in the first grid of icons.

Remember many - Like remember one, BUT when you have to remember the icons, there is not always one icon asked, but their can be many icons from the first grid.  Can you remember them all? Attention, sometimes in this mode the game tries to fool you and present you complete different icons, so you have to select none of them.
objects.summary:

objects.description:
Please read the "Help" page (Menu->Help) of the app to learn the basics about Pixl.

"This is where it all starts. A small glade in an endless forest. In the high grass you see three moose eating flowers. They look calm."

Pixl is a weird little retro-styled game about moose & evolution. You can feed & breed your moose and watch them walking around and doing whatever moose do.
Every moose has its own personality that shapes his behavior.  You can build entire moose families, you can watch the kids of your moose grow up and become parents themselves. You can name them, build friendships and be irrationaly sad once they die.
Think of it as a weird mix of a simulation game and an electronic pet.

As I said,  it's a weird game and it's probably not for everybody. I just hope that you have as much fun playing it as I had creating it.

Source code (licensed under GPLv3) is available on Github. For questions and ideas, please contact me via email.
objects.summary: Pixl - A weird little game about evolution.
objects.title: Pixl

objects.description:
Nemosyne mobile flash cards.

Nemosyne is compatible with the Mnemosyne 2.x desktop application.  This application will allow you to study on the go when you import your current flash card database (e.g. mnemosyne.db) onto your phone.

Visit http://mnemosyne-proj.org for more information on its flash card application.

Some features include:
* Dialog to browse where you stored the flash card database
* Rating Cards from 0 (No recognition) to 5 (Commited to Memory)
* Keeping track of scheduled, unmemorized, active cards
* Searching flash card database
* Adding, editing, deleting stored cards

However, Nemosyne cannot currently do the following:
* Manage or show tags.
* Embedded multimedia

If this application gets traction, I can see about adding support for any or all of the lacking features above.

I am not in any way affiliated with Mnemosyne or the Mnemosyne Project.
