objects.description:
Lixe is an easy way to synchronize your bookmarks across different devices and browsers. With the official Lixe Android App you can easily manage your bookmarks on the go and access them from everywhere, whenever you need them, without any effort.

Once you have synchronized your bookmarks with your Lixe account, they will be safely and privately stored and always at your disposal.

Edit, move, delete, add new links, search bookmarks and switch folders with just a gesture of your fingertips.

The app integrates into the Android universal share menu for quick and easy bookmarking from your browser and other apps. Go to the Share menu on any webpage, then choose 'Save to Lixe'. You can save your links on the go without even opening the Lixe app.

HOW DO I SYNCHRONIZE MY BOOKMARKS?

Simple, just use the free Lixe Browser extensions for Google Chrome or Opera Browser to synchronize all your bookmarks across different browsers and your Lixe Account.
When synchronizing, Lixe will automatically check for duplicates, create missing folders and do everything else you need to have a seamless experience when it comes to your bookmarks.

Keep your bookmarks always handy with Lixe.
objects.summary: Lixe, an easy way to synchronize, to manage and access your bookmarks on the go, anytime and anywhere.

objects.description:
Calculator uses 7 different prediction equations for estimating your 1RM and rep max performance from repetitions to fatigue. Remember that the results are not 100 % accurate and the degree of accuracy can vary between different weight training exercises as well as the weight training experience and muscular composition of the trainee.

Instructions to use this calculator:

Before you can calculate your estimated 1RM you have to lift a set with a weight you can lift up fully to a maximum of 12 repetitions. Then select the amount of weight lifted and the number of reps completed and hit the calculate button. On the results page swipe left to view percentages table.

You can also calculate your maximum repetitions when you know your 1RM. On the main calculator page you find a rep max calculator from the pull-down menu. Select your 1RM and desired number of reps and hit the calculate button.

Safety tips:

There are always risks when you're handling heavy weights. Be sure always to warm up and stretch your muscles and joints properly before the workout and especially when attempting your 1RM. It's always a good idea to ask a friend to act as a spotter to support your lifts. Stay hydrated and listen to your body to prevent injuries; you don't want to break yourself.

In conclusion:

Workout safely and regularly, have fun and good luck on attempting those 1RMs! :-)
objects.summary: A perfect app for planning your gym workouts. As a native 1RM and rep max calculator for Sailfish OS Maksimit is a must have app for all the weight training enthusiastic Sailfish OS users out there.
objects.title: Maksimit

objects.description:
RouteSkipper is designed to be used on the go. It's easy to see different routes, and you can click any stop to find additional connections that take you to your destination faster. It also shows you realtime data if it's available.

The application cover shows you the stops of your selected route as well as the time you have left to get there.

GPS options and route maps are planned, but it's not yet possible to make them due to limitations in Sailfish OS (QtLocation, QtPositioning).

objects.description:
FREE, SIMPLE, NO ADS, STAYS ALWAYS ON! 

Very simple wall timer like WOD workout timer for intensive training. The screen keeps on and additionally you can keep count of your own rounds or if your calculating for a friend. 

With counter buttons you can count repeats and rounds, pressing round button reset repeat counter so you can easily get result like 5+2. 

Application keeps screen on as long as the application is running, so this is perfect for long workouts and to be placed on a wall with a power supply! 

This application is meant to be personal or replace expensive wall timers with cost effective setup made possible by cheap Android tablets. 

Application has been tested with some different screen sizes, so if you have any problems please report us the device and send a screenshot if possible.

Application is perfect for Crossfit trainers, Crosstraining, HIIT, Running, Circuit etc.

objects.description:
With i2ctool you can control the Vdd (3.3V) pin, you can probe the i2c bus for devices and make read, write and write-then-read operations.
Additionally now has support to program EEPROM contents in such way that the toh-daemon understands them. This allows identification and starting other services/daemons upon TOH insertion with udev rules.
Also your app can access some unique-per-TOH configuration values.
If you want to make your own TOH with some electronics, please do not hesitate to contact me;
kimmoli at IRC, TMO
likimmo at Twitter
-----------
The Flattr donations i get from you this month will be redirected to VAMLAS, http://www.vamlas.fi/saatio/tausta/

objects.description:
booxTV allows you to record and watch recorded programs from Finnish free-to-air TV channels. Live viewing of some Finnish TV channels is also available. If you buy a license to booxTV Premium channel package, you can also watch some of the pay TV channels!

booxTV allows you to view recorded TV-shows from all Finnish free-to-air channels over 3G and Wi-Fi. Both streaming from the service and downloads to mobile are supported.

booxTV also offers Booxmote feature. Booxmote is intelligent visual remote controller that connects your mobile device to bigger screen for recording or Live TV playback. You can use Booxmote with computer web browsers, or directly with Samsung SmartTV through a dedicated app!

booxTV service is totally free for the first 30-days, after which you can buy commercial licenses to the service from the application.

objects.description:
Application for refereeing fencing. Keeps track of score, time, period and cards.

Clean interface free of clutter. Most screen elements can be pressed to activate and pressed+held to undo.

Example: tapping the score increments it and pressing and holding subtracts a touch.

Has many different type of bouts: 5, 10, 15, team, best 2 of 3, 15 touch sabre as well as custom length.

Most features can be turned on/off in settings to customize to your liking.

These can all be turned on or off in the settings:

Automatic 1 minute rest between periods.
Beep and vibrate to confirm events.
Pause bout on score.
Display fencer's names.
Increment opponents score on a red card.
Display score +/- buttons if you'd prefer that over the press/hold method.
objects.summary: Android app for helping fencing referees. Keeps track of fight score and time.
objects.title: Riposte

objects.description:
Is it possible to get results in just 5 minutes of training! Yes it is! 

Training Apps offers daily exercises that are planned and programmed by professionals. All the exercises are short and very effective! With the help of diary and timer functionalities it is easy to start training and follow your personal progress. 

With the help of this app you can improve your physical performance like power, endurance and speed with high intensity training methods. Lenght of the exercises varies from 4 to 30 mins and are mostly done with hardly any equipment. 

Our exercises are planned so that you can start training at gym, home or for example in hotel during a trip. There's only 3 exercises visible at a time, one for today, yesterday and tomorrow. One of these exercises is always totally equipment-free so you can do it virtually anywhere. 

Workout diary keeps track of the exercises you've done and also your results (time, repeats). Timer fills automatically workout time to the diary. 

http://www.trainingapps.fi
http://facebook.com/trainingapps
http://twitter.com/trainingapps

Training Apps offers daily exercises that are planned and programmed by professionals.

With complete control over the size of the puzzle and how badly shuffled it is, there's a challenge in here for everyone" - Steve from AAS (http://www.allaboutsymbian.com/flow/item/16857_IQ_ChallengeSlider_isnt_kiddin.php)

Complexity can be set from easy to extremely challenging independently from size of the puzzle (from 3x3 to 10x10)

objects.description: The Petrucci Music Library is a smartphone app for viewing classical sheet music, comprising over 1.6 Million musical scores. The data for the Petrucci Music Library App comes from around 1,600,000 OMR'ed sheets from some 160 thousand scores from the Petrucci Music Library, the Library of Congress and the Duke University Library. They contain almost 370 million notes. To use this app, enter the artist or composition that you require, and then select from a list of matching musical scores. Once selected, you can flip though the sheet music by swiping left or right, or using the buttons provided. This application is supported by the Culture Tech Fund, in partnership with the Culture Company which was funded by the Department of Culture Arts and Leisure. The grant funds innovative new projects which combine cultural and artistic output with digital technology. The fund is open to any organisation or freelance professional based in Derry (county or city) or working with a Derry-based partner. The Petrucci Music Library would not have been possible without this funding, and thanks to this grant, this ambitious project has truly come to life.
objects.summary: Seach and view classical sheet music on your phone.
objects.title: Petrucci Sheet Music

objects.description:
This app helps you find the train routes (MRT + LRT) which can be used to travel from one location to another in Singapore.

The search provides you with a list of alternative routes which can be used to travel from the source to destination station. It provides you with the number of line changes and station stops involved in each route. 

You can also view the detailed station list for each train line in Singapore. Also, you can long press on any station name from the list to see it on Google maps. The app also displays the Network Map.

This app cannot function from SD Card, so please install and keep it in the internal memory.

This app can work completely offline (without internet).
objects.summary:
Singapore Train Route Map
Singapore Train Route Planner
objects.title: Singapore Train Route Planner

objects.description:
This app has been designed to help you find Hong Kong Metro / MTR routes which can be used to travel from one location to another in Hong Kong .

The search provides you with a list of routes which can be used to travel from source to destination stations. You can also display the MTR map covering the relevant stations.
The app displays the number of train changes and station stops involved in each route.

You can also look at detailed station list for all routes on which MTR trains operate in Hong Kong. You can also long press on any station name to see it on maps. 

This app cannot function from SD Card, so please install and keep it in the Phone memory.
This app can work completely offline.

objects.description:
This app has been designed to help you find Metro routes which can be used to travel from one location to another within Delhi city in India.

You have options to either select the stations or type station names or allow the app to find your nearest station using phones last known geo-coordinates.

The search provides you with a list of routes which can be used to travel from source to destination stations using upto 4 lines. You can also display the metro map covering the relevant stations.
The app provides the number of train changes and station stops involved in each route.

You can also look at detailed station list for all routes on which Metro and Rapid Metro trains operate in Delhi NCR. You can also long press on any station name from Line Details list to see it on Google maps. 

This app cannot function from SD Card, so please install and keep it in the Phone memory.

This app can work completely offline.
objects.summary: Delhi Metro Route Planner and Delhi Metro Map
objects.title: Delhi Metro Route Planner/ Map

Godville is a massively-multiplayer zero-player game (ZPG). The gist of Godville is that it is a parody on everything from "typical" MMO games with their tedious level ups to internet memes and ordinary day to day things appealing to a wide audience.
In this app you can see information about Godville heroes. Just enter your godname and choose the server (Russian language â godville.net, English language â godvillegame.com). You don't need to know password.
English-language server players can only see basic information about heroes, like names or levels. Russian-language server players can see continually updated info like current health, quest progress and more. For this they should set the checkbox 'ÐÐ¿ÐµÑÐ°ÑÐ¸Ð²Ð½ÑÐµ Ð´Ð°Ð½Ð½ÑÐµ Ð² API' (Operational data from API) in the profile.
Also note that the information updates only for about one hour from your last login to the site.

objects.description:
Word game. WordPoly is THE game for all Scrabble and crossword lovers.
WordPoly is a fun word game where you try to create as many words as you can from the given letters. The letters define one whole word - the hidden word. The rules are simple - each word must contain the letter in the middle and the words must be at least 4 letters in length. No restriction on using plurals etc. This free version is an english-only version with ad support. The Pro version has spanish and french language supportand is ad-free.
Difficulty,sounds and vibrator can be set via the phone's Menu-button.

Keywords: word, game, polygon, times, letters, puzzle, scrabble, cross words

objects.description:
Ad supported word game. Wordoku is THE game to play for all Scrabble and crossword lovers.

Don't know how to play? Try the tutorial mode.

Wordoku is a Sudoku puzzle word game. The objective is to discover the 9-letter hidden word. The hidden word is located on one of the 9 horizontal lines. Each Wordoku sudoku puzzle consists of a 9 letters that each must appear only once in each 3x3 grid, once on each row and once on each column of the sudoku puzzle.

Includes English, French and Spanish. Language is selected automatically based on your phone's language settings.

The full English version contains over 3000 hidden words. The Spanish version has over 1000 hidden words.

Keywords: word, game, play, sudoku, drop words, word drop,  letters, puzzle, scrabble, cross words
objects.summary: Wordoku is a Sudoku puzzle word game. The objective is to discover the 9-letter hidden word.
objects.title: Wordoku Free

objects.description:
SleepWell is a basic media player, able to import your existings playlists. But it does more than that: you can configure presets with a playout duration and also set a volume fading interval.
Just run SleepWell when you are tired, select your favorite peaceful playlist and listen to it - SleepWell will automatically decrease the device volume as you fall asleep.
But that is still not all: you are also able to configure your presets to shutdown (or silence) your smartphone when the playout duration has elapsed, to guarantee a good rest.

Comments and suggestions are open to all, please thumb up if you like this app and give a word about it! :)

TL;DR - Features:
- The app will import the playlists located under Music/playlists at each launch, overwriting playlists previous version to enforce up to date content.
- PLS and M3U formats supported
- HTTP content supported (you can use playlists containing a webradio for instance)
- Ability to program device shutdown when playout duration has elapsed (a remorse timer will be visible to cancel)
- Same thing but instead the action is silencing the device and exiting app
- Landscape mode supported
- French language supported
objects.summary: SleepWell is an application putting yourself asleep (and optionnaly also your device) with a playlist you created in the Media app.
objects.title: SleepWell

objects.description:
This app helps you find London Underground, DLR, Overground and train routes which can be used to travel from one location to another in London city.  The app also displays TfL Service status.

You have got options to either select the stations from a dropdown list or type station names. The app informs you the zone in which the selected station falls.

The search provides you with a list of alternative routes which can be used to travel from the source to destination station. It provides you with the number of line changes and station stops involved in each route. The results are displayed based on your chosen sort option. The routes displayed by the app are based on the tubemap.

You can also view the detailed station list for each Tube line in London. Also, you can long press on any station name from the list to see it on online maps. 

This app cannot function from SD Card, so please install and keep it in the internal memory.

This app can work completely offline (without internet).
objects.summary: London Train Route Planner
objects.title: London Train Route Planner

objects.description:
You are not a coder but you can speak different languages and want to help software projects to be available in your native or any other language you speak? Then there is most probably a way for you to help. Many free software projects are using platforms like Transifex to translate their content into different languages. With Framrekkari, a client for these services, that currently supports the Transifex API, it is now possible for you to translate everywhere on your Sailfish OS powered device.

Framrekkari (old high German for translator) currently only supports the Transifex API, but the support of other services and servers like Pootle is planned for the future, at least if they provide an own API.

Features:
* browse available projects
* show single project, the resources, languages and source strings
* filter and search source strings
* translate source strings into other languages
* mark translations as reviewed or not reviewed
* translated into German, Catalan, Polish, Spanish and Hungarian
* translated mostly into Danish, Czech and Finnish
* translated partly into Frensh and Dutch (Netherlands)

Transifex API has some limitations. You can find more information about them on the application's help page.
objects.summary: Translate software everywhere with Framrekkari.
objects.title: Framrekkari

objects.description:
Tappr is a simple but addictive minimalist arcade game.

It's really easy to play: Tap the white rectangles before they reach the top of the screen and survive as long as possible.

So go ahead, raise your high score and see how you compare to all the other players with the worldwide ranking feature.

FAQ:
How do I change xyz?
From the info page (menu->info). Sound can be muted directly from the menu.

Why does your app need internet?
Tappr uses an external server to get stats and rankings. For this reason, your highscore is uploaded to the internet. You can disable all internet communication from the info screen.

The source code is available on GitHub. If you have any questions, ideas or feedback, please feel free to contact me.
objects.summary: Tappr - old school arcade game
objects.title: Tappr

objects.description:
Additional features:
-write to process stdin inside the app (does not work for passwords in ssh, su etc.)
-change font size of output, wrap/unwrap output
-start / stop commands, or run detached

Future features are:
-In app script support: setup parameters, GUI for giving parameters, default parameters.
-Hopefully UI patch which integrates the app into the events view

Note that careless commands might lead to data loss. Be aware that you and only you will be responsible of how you use this app.

For running commands as root (requires developer mode), I suggest installing sudo from mer-tools -repository and adding privileges individually for each command you need. I do not recommend using nopasswd: all. Using "devel-su -c" works fine when running in Fingerterm.

Licensed under 3-clause BSD.

objects.description:
In box view, each folder and file is displayed as a rectangle of the respective size, letting you dive down the structure of large directories instantly to find out which files are using up your valuable storage. Once found you can delete them right away, or open supported file types with the default application.

Alternatively, you can use list view to have files/directories and their size displayed in a normal list. 
When minized, the cover shows how much of your storage is currently used.

Of course, Space Inspector does not have privileged access to your file system. Thus, the actual size of some folders may differ due to restricted access e.g. to system files.

Please note: this app is currently in beta state. If you are having questions, problems or suggestions, please file a new issue on the project's GitHub page: https://github.com/jklingen/space-inspector/issues - thanks :)
objects.summary:
No matter how much storage youâve got â it will be full. 

Space Inspector helps to find large folders and files on your storage by visualizing storage usage in a diagram of boxes (aka treemap).
objects.title: Space Inspector

objects.description:
WARNING:
This app allows you to mess up your sound configuration to the point where you may no longer be able to talk on the phone until the system is restarted.

Your Jolla comes with a PulseAudio server, which means that for example, you can send and receive audio streams to and from other PulseAudio server on the network. As it turns out, this app is also useful for routing audio to sinks connected via Bluetooth, e.g. headphones or car stereos.

NOTE:
To successfully play music over WiFi, you need a pretty awesome connection. Latency spikes WILL lead to stuttering, glitches and gaps. Obviously, a high load on your WiFi will cause problems. Less obviously, other WiFi networks in the vicinity can cause latency spikes, too, if they use the same or similar frequencies. You might not notice this during web surfing, but with PulseAudio tunneling, latency becomes critical. I get reliable playback when pings from the phone to the server stay below 20 ms.

So make sure to use a WiFi channel that has as little disturbance from other WiFis as possible.
objects.summary: Manage your local PulseAudio server, e.g. send or receive audio streams to/from other PulseAudio servers.
objects.title: PulseTunnel

objects.description:
YTPlayer is a native YouTube application for SailfishOS. It makes it easy to browse and manage YouTube content on your Jolla phone. 

YTPlayer is not a finished product. It does not offer comparable feature set to the official YouTube Android application. More advanced features are planned, but implementing them will take some time. 

Wherever possible YTPlayer tries to use official YouTube APIs. Unfortunately those APIs don't provide enough information to implement essential features like video playback. To implement those, YTPlayer needs to access data through undocumented and sometimes obfuscated channels. As a result YTPlayer might fail to play certain videos correctly. If you find such content please consider filling a bug report at https://github.com/tworaz/sailfish-ytplayer/issues.

YTPlayer translations can be contributed via Transifex:  https://www.transifex.com/tworaz/ytplayer/
objects.summary: Unofficial YouTube client for Sailfish OS.
objects.title: YTPlayer

objects.description:
Fill in the fields and the app will generate a password, every time you fill in the same info, the same password will be generated. That way you won't have to memorise anything but the data you put in (i.e. your name, the service that you need the password for, like a bank or Facebook). There is a field that asks you how many times you have changed password in this service (i.e. google) so that you only have to change that number and a different password will be generated.
Some services don't accept certain characters, you can write these characters so the password that would be generated will avoid them and of course you can control the length of the password.

You can check the strength of the generated passwords on: http://www.passwordmeter.com/

You may also use a web version of this App here:

Release 1/2: https://googledrive.com/host/0BwY5nE0jf5P0WnkxRTZkUkVRRnM/index.html
Realease 3/4
https://googledrive.com/host/0BwY5nE0jf5P0QUtrTnp5ZHZtVmc/index.html
Release 5: https://googledrive.com/host/0BwY5nE0jf5P0MXRrdjZaTDk0MzA/index.html
Release 6: https://googledrive.com/host/0BwY5nE0jf5P0R2NtQzFtTEtpNzg/index.html
Release 7 and Version 2: https://googledrive.com/host/0BwY5nE0jf5P0ZExZai1YRUdFbU0/index.html

This application is free software under the version 2 of the GNU General Public License and its source can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/orestes1986/SailfishPassGen
objects.summary: This is an application that helps you have strong passwords, different for each service without having to memorize or store them anywhere!

oneSSHot is an ssh command automation tool. It is designed to fire ssh commands to remote hosts with a single tap of the screen.

Some test commands included:

echo 'SailfishOS: '`date +'%y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'` > /tmp/onesshot.tmp

/home/wickwire/startFirefox.bash

$ cat startFirefox.bash 
#!/bin/bash

export DISPLAY=:0
/usr/bin/firefox http://www.cnn.com

objects.description:
Chaos and Mayhem is an addictive puzzle game. The gameplay is easy to learn so it is suitable for kids and adults. Your mission is to get the red vehicle out of the puzzle. To play the game you can use your fingers.

Features:
- 80 handmade levels
- Levels' direction randomization (4 directions and mirrors)
- 640 different kind of level variations
- 3 themes (cars, boats and trains)
- Easy, medium and hard levels
- Beautiful, Full HD graphics
- Simple but challenging gameplay
- Native Sailfish application

Your mission in the game is to help a red vehicle to get out of the screen. The hero of the game always founds himself in the middle of rush hour. No matter if he is trying to get his boat out of the harbor, his car out of the parking area or his boss' train out of the trains' warehouse. Luckily he has a good friend who knows pretty much about all vehicles and he can help you by breaking in to other vehicles and move those away. Can you help these guys so that the red vehicle finds its way to home? You can move all vehicles forward and backward by using your finger. Your vehicle is easy to recognize from the red color and the exit is always in the front of the red vehicle. In some levels there are unusable areas like shoals, holes and big stones.
objects.summary: Chaos and Mayhem is an addictive puzzle game. It is easy to learn so it is suitable for kids and adults. Your mission is to get the red vehicle out of the puzzle by using your fingers.
objects.title: Chaos & Mayhem

objects.changes:
2.3.1:
  - Tablet UI & support.
  - Literal mode.
  - Update sympy to 0.7.6.1
  - Performance improvements on "big" stacks.

2.2.1:
  - Allow ".4" to be entered instead of "0.4".
  - Fix precision limit in sympy engine.
  - Better performance for deep stacks (still more enhancements to do).
  - Move constants (except pi) into their own submenu.
  - Add "dice" module, allowing for RPG dice rolling (d4 / d6 / d8 / d10 / d12 / d20 / d100) in expressions.

2.1.1:
  - Current settings info under calculator "screen"
  - Copy / Drop / Pick each stack element individually on long press.
  - Degraded numeric mode (using mpmath) while symbolic engine is loading. Allows immediate use for quick computations.

2.0.1:
  - Unlimited stack.
  - Symbolic backend based on sympy.
  - Option to enable symbolic mode or not.
  - Real time sympy expression validation.
  - Explicit error messages on missing / wrong operand and wrong expression.
  - Precision option for stack display / evaluation.
  - Each stack element is flickable individually if too large.
  - Stack is now flickable in place instead of pull down menu style.
  - Symplify expression function.
  - Hide inactive buttons depending on sub-button activation (orange / blue).
  - Settings page on left swipe.
  - Cleaner code.

Known bugs : 
  - Cover display wrongly if stack values too long.
  - Some characters are clipped if they are too tall ('Âµ' for example).

Future updates :
  - Equation solving.
  - Full sympy expression editor with virtual keyboard.
  - Ability to "UNDO" multiple times.

"Long term" updates:
  - Function pretty view on stack element long press.
  - Documented functions.

objects.description: Are you tired of remembering all your different passwords? Or are you using everywhere the same one? If you stumbled over that - ownKeepass is the answer for you to keep track and securely store all your passwords for web pages, bank accounts, login credentials and all other stuff which need to be kept secret. You can share the database file with Keepass on your desktop system and maintain one single encrypted database wherever you are. You will only need to remember one very strong master password to open your database. ownKeepass reads and writes Keepass 1 and reads Keepass 2 databases. It cannot yet write to Keepass 2 databases. This is planned for a later release. --- ownKeepass is open source software and released under GPL version 2. Sources are hosted at github.
objects.summary: ownKeepass is a Keepass compatible password safe application for Sailfish OS +++ New: Keepass 2 database read support +++ Version for Jolla Tablet available +++

Loads of bug fixes and new features will be published, but you can safely take Personal Travis to the gym with you. He's already housetrained.

Are you ready to throw your papers in the trash?

objects.description:
Koersinformatie, het sentiment en koop- en verkoopargumenten voor AEX, AMX en BEL-20 aandelen. Kortom alle beleggingsinformatie op 123aandeel.nl is vanaf nu ook gratis beschikbaar voor uw telefoon. Met deze app steelt u altijd de show op verjaardagsfeestjes, borrels en andere gelegenheden, want nu beschikt juist u over inhoudelijke beleggings-argumentatie.

Argumenten
Bezoekers van de website kunnen argumenten toevoegen. Deze argumenten worden vervolgens beoordeeld door andere bezoekers. Een goed argument is een duim omhoog een slecht argument een duim omlaag. Op deze manier wordt er een waardering gevormd voor elk argument, welke ook zichtbaar is in de app.

Sentiment
Het sentiment geeft het vertrouwen van beleggers in een aandeel weer. Het sentiment wordt berekend door een wiskundig model op basis van koersdoelen van beleggers. Beleggers kunnen hun koersdoelen voor aandelen doorgeven op 123aandeel.nl.
objects.summary: Koersinformatie, het sentiment en koop- en verkoopargumenten voor AEX, AMX en BEL-20 aandelen. Kortom alle beleggingsinformatie en beleggings-argumentatie zijn toegankelijk op uw mobiel.
objects.title: 123 Aandeel

objects.description:
Top like application. Show applications/processes on your cell phone sorted either by CPU or memory usage. You can also terminate/kill selected process. Cover page shows average load.

Important notice:

* Do not kill stuff unless you know what you are doing, can lead into lot of troubles.
* Memory column shows RSS (Resident Set Size) which is not a real memory usage. It includes shared resources, so the number is typically bigger.
* Average load doesn't mean CPU utilization as it includes processes waiting for io as well. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Load_(computing)

objects.description:
Tired of trying to remember all your passwords?

Safe lite is an application storing all kinds of personal information like passwords, PIN codes and credit card numbers in a safe place behind one master password. All the data is secured with a strong AES 256-bit encryption.

In Safe lite you may customize every entry as you wish without fixed fields. You can add all information you need and nothing more.

objects.changes: Fixed bug: when de-selecting a check, the heading should remove its check (colour from green back to yellow again). Now it does. Thanks for feedback!
objects.description:
Checklists is a simple Sailfish app that assists pilots with completing their check lists.

The data of the app are checklists. See the checklistsdata folder in your Documents folder.
Checklists are plain text files. You may create as many as you like.
Create them by using a text editor on your PC.
Connect (USB) your Sailfish device to your with your PC.
Go to your Documents/checklistsdata folder on the Sailfish device and copy the checklist files into that folder. 
Use a plain text file - no styling what so ever - and save the file as (plain) text with the ".txt" extension.

Creating the text file
A "set of checks" is always preceded by a heading (e.g. "COCKPIT CHECKS").
A heading starts with an "*" ("*COCKPIT CHECKS").
Each check (e.g. "Mass Switch ON") ends with newline (ENTER).
If you want multiple lines within one check, use an ";" at the end of each line and only the newline at the end of the complete check text.
See the EUROFOX.txt as an example.

This app may NOT be used as a replacement of the official check lists.

Wim de Vries
wsvries@xs4all.nl

objects.description:
Simple monitor showing current battery consumption. Visible in cover action as well, so you can peek to see how battery hungry is your phone at itâs current state even from running applications.

It displays three values - current consumption which is by default last 1s, average which is by default average for last 10s and long average which is 24 hours. You can configure these time intervals via Settings menu as well as sampling intervals. Short values are kept only during application runtime, long average value is kept even between application runs. There is an option to store these statistics even to permanent storage to keep  them available after reboot.

Hunger meter can help you decide whether changes you did to your device setup are going to help you get better battery life or not (for example which applications doesnât hurt keep running on background and which does). It also gives you estimate how long will your battery last given your customs and average consumption.

NOTE: Running this application can also increase a consumption a little. It periodically takes measurements to average them and displaying graph can take some more effort as well.

Sources are available on Github. Patches are welcome.
objects.summary: Simple monitor showing current and average battery consumption.  It also makes a pretty graph of it.
objects.title: Hunger Meter

objects.description:
SailOTP is a Sailfish Implementation of the Google-Authenticator algorithms, also known as TOPT (timer based) and HOTP (counter based) as described in RFC 6238 and 4226. A growing number of sites uses this algorithm for two-factor-authentication, including Github, Linode and several Google services.

One can add new OTP-entries using the pulley-menu. Codes can be added using the integrated QR-Code-Reader or by manually typing in the token information.

The main view of the app will show a list off all entries and their current One-Time-Tokens. The entries will be regenerated every 30 seconds, the remaining time for the current tokens is shown through a progress bar at the top of the app. HOTP-type tokens are not updated automatically, instead a refresh button is shown on the right of the token to calculate the next value and increment the counter. An entry can be edited, deleted or moved up and down in the list by long-pressing on it.

In edit-mode one can show a QR-Code of the entry (e.g. for importing it on another device) through the pulley menu.

One entry can be stared by tapping the star icon on the left. the stared item will be shown on the ActiveCover. If the Token is timer based, it will be refreshed every 30 seconds. 5 seconds before the token changes it's color will change to red. For counter based tokens a cover action to calculate the next token is shown instead. The item can be unstared by tapping the star icon again on the main view.

From the main view a token can be copied to the clipboard by tapping on it.

From the pulley menu the token database can be exported to a file for backup purposes. The backup is a AES-256-CBC encrypted and
Base64 encoded file containing a JSON-representation of the database.

Importing the file is also possible from the pulley menu. If a file contains tokens that are already in the database (title and secret of the token match an existing one), these tokens will not be added again.
objects.summary: A Sailfish implementation of the Google Authenticator  Algorithm for Two-Factor-Authentication as used by sites like Github, Linode and Google
objects.title: SailOTP

objects.changes:
What's new with version 1.2?
============================
- Fixing a bug preventing the game to launch since Sailfish update 1.0.3.8

What's new with version 1.1.2?
============================
- Current game is automatically saved on app exit
- Animations can be turned off to spare battery life
- Settings are saved for next executions (difficulty, music On/Off, animations On/Off)
NB: Stored files are located in $HOME/.config/harbour-saildoku

What was not fixed/improved and why?
===================================
- More note numbers -- in the time being, I cannot offer them as there is a bug in Qt 5 about making QList<QObjectSubClass*> visible to QML (see QTBUG-36226), and I want to use them to easily be able to change the amount of note numbers.
- Sound problems (media player stopping, sound effects played even if in silent mode, volume too high,...) -- this is also a known bug in SailfishOS that was reported on together.jolla.com. I cannot do anything as long as it is not fixed...
objects.description:
Saildoku is a classic 9x9 Sudoku puzzle game. Each puzzle has a unique solution.
Enjoy solving some grids with no less than 6 complexity levels! The background music helps one to relax and think when playing Saildoku, but it can be disabled via the Pulley menu. It features nice animations that can also be turned off to spare battery life.

This application is *native* - it uses QtQuick 2.0 with a Qt C++ backend.
This application is completely free and will always remain free (and ad-free, important point).

TL;DR - Features:
- Native Sailfish app
- 6 levels of complexity
- 500 different 9x9 grids for each level of complexity, all featuring a unique solution
- Timer & error counter for each game
- Autosave on app exit
- Native animations rendered with QtQuick
- Background music and sounds included

Credit for the music:
- Original title is "Lament forest", composed by "i-miss-you"
- Free soundtrack available at http://www.newgrounds.com/
objects.summary: Sudoku puzzles game with unique solutions and 6 levels of complexity.
objects.title: Saildoku

objects.description:
The Tethering app allows you to share your mobile data connection over Wifi or Bluetooth. It uses NAT and creates a private network, which is shared over Wifi (WPA2) or Bluetooth PAN.

The needed connections will be automatically switched on, when enabling tethering, so there's no need to change your network settings. The app also restores your network settings to the previous state, when you switch tethering off or close the app.

Only the Wifi network name and pre-shared key needs to be configured. After that you just have to enable tethering, connect to the network and start surfing.

objects.description:
This is a simple application that generates TOTP and HOTP passcodes, like Google Authenticator does for Android. There is an experimental QR code scanner included that uses the viewfinder of the built in camera application to capture QR codes. This may not always work, if it fails, you can always enter the secret key manually. Accounts can be exported to other devices by scanning the account specific QR code. This QR code is visible when editing an account, if it is possible to export the account details using the otpauth uri scheme.

Source code is available at https://github.com/stozze/harbour-sgauth. 

Feel free to report issues and contribute on GitHub.

objects.description:
Peer-to-peer clipboard synchronization tool.

Ctrl+C on one computer, Ctrl+V on another.

Clipboard is instantly synchronized across all your devices. It can handle all
forms of text, images and even application-specific data.

HaveClip is multiplatform. Copy something in one OS, paste in another.
Supports Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, Sailfish OS and Android.

To use clipboard sync, install HaveClip on your PC and your Jolla.

More information about how to configure HaveClip can be found on project homepage http://www.havefun.cz/projects/haveclip/

Known issues:
- in order to sync clipboard from Jolla to PC, one must bring HaveClip to foreground after copying text, or else HaveClip will not notice it. Sync from PC to Jolla works fine.

- for Jolla to be auto-discovered by other devices, it must be active, meaning the screen
must be turned on.
objects.summary: Synchronize your clipboard with PC.
objects.title: HaveClip

objects.description:
S.M.T.H. (Send Me To Heaven) is a sport game. Player throws his phone as high as he can. The higher, the better. The phone registers the height and uploads result to leader boards. World Top 10, Week Top 10, Day Top 10, Local Top 10 (national) and Facebook Friends lists are available. 


SAFETY FIRST: Be careful not to injure yourself or others. Be always aware that there is enough space above you and around you. 


WARNING: Throwing a smartphone high into the air may result in both damage to the smartphone, property and/or personal injury. Author and distributor of S.M.T.H. is not liable for any damages or injuries arising out of playing the S.M.T.H. game.


HINTS: Avoid rotations in the air. Rotating phones can give wrong results. Every phone is different, so it needs a different treatment. Start to throw your phone gently about 20 cm, find the way which works for you and increase the height gradually. Developing skills is the part of the game!


NOTE: Game works only on ARMv7 phones.


Q&A:
Q: I want to change my nickname. How?
A: Uninstall S.M.T.H. App and install it again. You will be asked to pick your name again. 


Q: How can somebody throw the phone over 40 meters?
A: I received some photographs. I don't want to pubish them as I wouldn't recommend to anyone to try that. It's not a safe practice. 


Q: I keep getting result 0 meters even if I toss my phone high. Why?
A: Evey type of phone behaves differently as sensors are differently implemented. In most cases the problem is caused by rotations in air.
Be sure that S.M.T.H. is the only App running on your phone. Place your phone on your palm, screen up. SLOWLY move your hand down. STOP for a moment. SMOOTHLY throw your phone up in air about 50 cm from your hand, avoiding any rotation. Let it land on your palm, screen still UP. Increase the height gradually.
Learn proper skills. Master your tool. Become a champion!


Post photos and videos of your attempts: https://www.facebook.com/S.M.T.H.game


Copyright Â© 2012 - 2013 Petr Svarovsky
objects.summary: S.M.T.H. (Send Me To Heaven) is a sport game. Player throws his phone as high as he can. The higher, the better. The phone registers the height and uploads result to leader boards.
objects.title: S.M.T.H.

objects.description:
File Browser is a simple tool to view files on your phone.

USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. This app can be used to corrupt files on the phone and make the phone unusable. The author does not take any responsibility if that happens. So, be careful.

Features:

 - Browse and search folders and files on the phone
 - Open files (if xdg-open finds a preferred application)
 - Preview JPEG, PNG and GIF files
 - Play WAV, MP3, OGG and FLAC audio
 - Install Android APK and Sailfish RPM packages
 - View contents of APK, RPM, ZIP and TAR packages
 - View contents of text and binary files
 - Select multiple files (by tapping the file icons)
 - Cut, copy and paste files (by long pressing an item or tapping the file icons)
 - Rename files and folders
 - Create new folders
 - Delete files and folders (by long pressing an item or tapping the file icons)
 - Change permissions

objects.description:
Medard provides detailed weather forecast for Czech Republic and Central Europe.
It is based on numerical weather prediction model MM5, a joint project of the Institute of Computer Science AS CR and Czech Hydrometeorological Institute.

This is probably the first application that fully supports keyboard shortcuts, awaiting TOHKBD2.

Keyboard shortcuts:

-    Right/left to move in time
-    Tab to switch between regions
-    P for precipitation, W for wind velocity, S for sea level pressure, T for temperature, C for cloudinness.
-    R to refresh

UI shortcuts:

-    tap the picture to jump forward (or to stop the animation)
-    hold the picture to jump back to the current time
-    drag the image right and left to browse times
-    hold the Play button to see the slider

Source code: https://github.com/nodevel/harbour-medard
objects.summary: Medard Weather Forecast for Czech Republic and Central Europe
objects.title: Medard Weather

objects.description:
This App is a handy reference list of 140 browser-supported colors. 
which are sorted based on: 
- Color name
- Hex code, and 
- Color family.
These 140 color names can be defined under HTML and CSS color specification tags. 
All of the major browsers have included support for these colors.
objects.summary: This App is a handy reference list of 140 browser-supported colors.
objects.title: Web Colors

objects.changes: Changed to new save game format which should behave better between versions. Sorry, but this will break your save games! Removed SD-card references for Jolla.
objects.description:
Aaagh! is roguelike -inspired hack'n slash dungeon crawl / rpg for touchscreen Android devices. 

The game is completely free, no ads or anything commercial here. We just wanted to make and publish a game.

25 levels of randomized magic and mayhem! Kill the monsters, fight the bosses and collect the loot! Three different endings! Contains also eyeball-exploding graphics, bad grammar, spelling errors, bugs and weird sounds. We hope you like it! :)

The gameplay is somewhere between Dungeon Master and Diablo, with heavy emphasis on killing enemies and getting new items and skills, but still keeping the game casual. All progress is saved between levels.

Aaagh! is written by two dudes and 'completed' with the help of our friends and family. The game is tested to work with handful of phones, but if it doesn't, check the settings if there's something that helps. 

There's also some cheats in the settings in case the game feels too difficult. The game uses vibrator permission for game effects and file permissions for save games.
objects.summary: A free old-school dungeon crawler with weird humor!
objects.title: Aaagh!

objects.description: With Jolla Notes app you can quickly write small notes and memos. The app cover shows either one note, if you swipe away from that note, or a brief summary of three latest notes. You can quickly create a new note using a cover action. Set colours for notes, so you can categorise them and find a specific note from a group of notes. Long press a word to select it. Keeping your finger pressed a bit longer will select the entire row and finally everything. Adjust text selection by moving handles horizontally. Text is automatically copied to clipboard when a selection is made or changed. Paste by tapping the clipboard icon on top left of the keyboard.
objects.summary: Notes is a handy app for writing down things you need to remember.
objects.title: Notes

objects.description:
Jolla Calculator is a neat math companion. Quickly do a simple calculation or compose an elaborate one made from several linked calculations:
- tapping a result from other calculations uses it in your calculation and creates a link to it (12 + [result])
- linked results are updated if the original calculation is changed
- long calculations can be panned horizontally
- pull keypad up to clear calculations
objects.summary: 1+1=3. Math is hard! Jolla Calculator can help you out.
objects.title: Calculator
